CleanHive – Terms & Conditions

 

Services Offered

CleanHive provides professional Wash, Fold, Ironing, Dry Cleaning, and Express Delivery services.

 

Pickup & Delivery

  • Pickup and delivery are scheduled based on the customer-selected time slot.
  • Ensure availability at the pickup/delivery location during the selected time window.
  • Express/Urgent delivery is charged at 50% extra over the regular tariff.
  • Delays due to traffic, weather, or other unforeseen events may occur.
  • No refunds or reductions will apply, but we will keep you informed proactively.

 

Order and Billing

  • A detailed bill/invoice (physical or digital) will be provided at order confirmation.
  • The original bill/invoice must be presented when collecting processed items from the store.
  • CleanHive reserves the right to withhold delivery until proper verification is completed.

 

Garment Care & Limitations

  • We use industry-standard processes for stain removal, but 100% removal is not guaranteed.
  • No refunds or reductions will be provided for incomplete stain removal.
  • In case of loss/damage, liability is limited to 10x the processing fee or ₹3,000, whichever is lower.
  • Claims must be made within 24 hours of delivery/collection with supporting evidence.
  • No claims will be accepted without a valid order record or invoice.
  • Garments not collected within 3 weeks of delivery may be donated or disposed of at CleanHive’s discretion.
  • CleanHive is not liable for:
    • Items left in pockets (e.g., cash, notes, cards, keys)
    • Normal wear and tear, shrinkage, color fading, or pre-existing damage
    • Damage due to manufacturing defects or fragile fabrics
    • Garments without care labels or special instructions

 

Images & Promotions

CleanHive may use images of garments for promotional purposes.


Payment & Pricing

  • Accepted payment modes: Cash, UPI, Credit/Debit Cards, Net Banking.
  • We reserve the right to change pricing, packages, offers, and terms without prior notice.

 

Cancellations & Rejections

  • Cancellation is not allowed once garments have been picked up.
  • We may decline garments that pose a risk to other items or equipment.

 

Privacy Policy

We respect your privacy. Customer data is used only for service delivery and will not be shared without consent.

 

Disputes & Contact

  • All disputes are subject to the jurisdiction of courts in Delhi only.
  • Any issues should be reported to customer support for resolution.
  • Contact us at: support@cleanhive.in
